content: At some point I shifted in thinking of marketing as “sell as much of this thing as possible” to thinking of marketing as “How can I best publicize the virtues, uses, and value of any thing?” It’s a lot more approachable with that kind of high-level mindset. For example: If you get tired, you should sleep. Tiredness is a strong sign that you need sleep. Nodding off at the wheel causes deaths and car crashes. Well-rested people learn better and work more efficiently.
